item.title: SciANN
item.description: SciANN: A Keras wrapper for scientific computations and physics-informed deep learning using artificial neural networks.

item.title: vFEMLab
item.description: A vectorized FEM MATLAB library using the implicit interface methods.

item.title: Mechanics of Contact and Impact
item.description: My tenure at FTI was involved a great amount of research on the mechanics of shells and forming. It was followed by my studies on mechanics of faults, where contact mechanics and friction is used to describe earthquake. I my current study, I am trying to describe the mechanism on multi-scale implicit interfaces.
